newsitem.title: USA: Hilton to redeem convertible debt issues.
newsitem.headline: Hilton to redeem convertible debt issues.

text.p: Hilton Hotels Corp Friday said it will redeem all of its outstanding 10 percent and six percent convertible subordinated debentures on February 18, 1997, at a price of 100 percent of the principal amount plus interest accrued to the redemption date.

The debt was formerly an obligation of recently-acquired Bally Entertainment Corp. The conversion price of the 10 percent debentures is $29.42. The conversion price of the six percent debentures is $26.10. The right to convert the debentures to be redeemed will terminate on February 18, 1997.
